localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title: The woman shot and killed today was Ashli Babbit, a 14-year veteran, who served four tours with the US Air Force, and was a high level security official throughout her time in service. https://t.co/N0zFOuYuZs
blogPost.author: The_Real_Fly

localize.full_text: 今天被枪杀的女子是阿什莉·巴比特(Ashli Babbit)，她是一名14年的退伍军人，曾在美国空军服役4次，在服役期间一直是一名高级安全官员。https://t.co/N0zFOuYuZs
今天被槍殺的女子是阿什莉·巴比特(Ashli Babbit)，她是一名14年的退伍軍人，曾在美國空軍服役4次，在服役期間一直是一名高級安全官員。https://t.co/N0zFOuYuZs

previous.excerpt: Todayist helps busy folks fit what matters most into their day. Prioritize your goals, tasks, and most importantly: YOURSELF. Stay inspired with bite-sized activities tailored to you. Download on iOS and Android to live your life with purpose.💚
previous.title: Todayist - Your friendly planning tool to make the most of every day

localize.description: Todayist 帮助忙碌的人们将最重要的事情融入到他们的一天。优先考虑你的目标，任务，以及最重要的。你自己。通过为你量身定制的小活动来保持灵感。在iOS和Android上下载，让你的生活更有目标.💚。
localize.tagline: 您的友好计划工具，让您的每一天都能得到充分的利用。
